title: Index of Deposits Activity for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1875-1919 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted Data 1918-1943. Units Are Based On The Relation Of Debits To Deposit Accounts To Demand Deposits In Leading Banking Cities. See Description In The Source For The Changing Number Of Cities Covered. Data For 1918 Were Derived By The 1919 Ratio Of 2228.5/1283=1.7369. Source: Data Were Furnished Directly From The Federal Reserve Bank Of New York And Are On A 1941 Revision.

This NBER data series m12008b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 12 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter12.html.

NBER Indicator: m12008b
